full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS 'KHOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DPAL MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS MCHOD BDE STONG ROL BA'I GAR MKHAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG RGYAL RI KHROD DANG CHEN PO NAM MKHA'I DBU MZAD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGO ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KHYAB BDAG GANGS RI'I MGON PO MCHOG GIS ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PAS BTZUN PA SKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS KYIS CHOS 'KHOR MA'I 'GYUR LHUN GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG LEGS BSHAD GLING DU SBYAR BA DE LA MNOS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA MKHAS RNAMS KHREL BA MED SU ZHU, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
